ygData.msgSnippet: The large horse stopped flailing around, and looked at Longhaul, or at least turned his eyless face towards the Constructicons. In a low inhuman growl, he

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

The large horse stopped flailing around, and looked at Longhaul, or at
least turned his eyless face towards the Constructicons. In a low
inhuman growl, he roared, "Nightmare, TERRORIZE". The horse from hell
then verred back, and let out a sick moan, as it's chest opened up, it's
front hooves being stored into it's abdomine compartment, as it then
shut, revealing a large Decepticons symbole. It then stood up on it's
hind hooves, as three toes sprang down on each, to offer support to the
legs. The wings then folded back, as the horse head folded into two
pieces, revealing Nightmares helmet like face. The horse head pieces
fell to his sided, then emerged fists, becoming his arms. He then
saluted to Longhaul. "Affirmative sir." he moaned in his low dead tone.
"Decist Jagged." he ordered.

Jagged stopped, and emmited the same abominal excuse for a Hyena cackle.
"Jagged, Terrorize." he screamed, as he then did a front hand stand. His
lower body containing his lower legs, swiveds around, as the paws
holding him up, emmited reconfigured to become his feet. His Hyena head
shifted up to his chest, so he had the grim grinning face on his chest.
His mane move up the back of his body, perching itself over the
shoulders, as his face emerged, a mess of teeth, a singe mechanicaly
enhanced eye, hooking on to the mane. This new set of teeth dripped as
well, as he then began to look himself over, the mechanical eye zoomin
in and out every once in a while, as he checked his many jagged tallons
covering his body. "Yeahhhhh, I like it." he hissed.
